import math
n=input()
if n&1==0:
    n+=1   
found=0
def checkPrime(x):
    if x<=1:
        return 0
    if x%2==0:
        return 0
    else:
        root=int(math.sqrt(x))+1
        for i in range(3,root,2):
            if x%i==0:
                return 0    
        else:
            return 1
        
while not found:
    if checkPrime(n):
        if str(n)==str(n)[::-1]:
            print n
            found=1
        else:
            n+=2
    else:
        n+=2
